remarks: The unit scalar of the closed kernel dual of a vector space. (Contributed by NM, 11-Jun-2015.)
statement:
lcdneg.h $e |- H = ( LHyp ` K ) $.
lcdneg.u $e |- U = ( ( DVecH ` K ) ` W ) $.
lcdneg.r $e |- R = ( Scalar ` U ) $.
lcdneg.m $e |- M = ( invg ` R ) $.
lcdneg.c $e |- C = ( ( LCDual ` K ) ` W ) $.
lcdneg.s $e |- S = ( Scalar ` C ) $.
lcdneg.n $e |- N = ( invg ` S ) $.
lcdneg.k $e |- ( ph -> ( K e. HL /\ W e. H ) ) $.
lcdneg $p |- ( ph -> N = M ) $.
